plot: Missing his sweetheart, the ever-romantic Mr. Right decides to reach out to the love of his life the old-fashioned way, through a poetic love letter.
title: Forever, My Love
plot_es: Missing his sweetheart, the ever-romantic Mr. Right decides to reach out to the love of his life the old-fashioned way, through a poetic love letter.
plot_en: Missing his sweetheart, the ever-romantic Mr. Right decides to reach out to the love of his life the old-fashioned way, through a poetic love letter.
